Today we adopted the Dubai Autonomous Leadership Strategy. By 2030, 25% of Dubai's traffic will be smart and without a driver https://t.co/AoYmFckYRP

The strategy will contribute to increasing the efficiency of the transport sector, reducing congestion, reducing pollution, providing millions of hours of wasted mobility and increasing the productivity of individuals
The strategy is a joint venture between the Roads and Transport Authority (RTA) and the Dubai Foundation for the Future
We also launched the Dubai World Autobahn Challenge, the world's largest tender for companies and R & D centers to apply this technology to the streets of Dubai
Dubai offers a unique global model for the future city and becomes the largest laboratory for the research, development and application of mobile mobility technology https://t.co/5N3v4TLT0i

We need a collective and value-based response to the refugee crisis, based on sudden sharing not sudden shifting - at Kara Tepe Camp #Lesbos
We need a collective and effective solution to the refugee crisis, a solution of sharing the burden rather than transferring it to others - at the Kara Tibi Refugee Camp in Lesbos
Responsibility for refugees can not be defined by geography. It is greater than any one country or any one region's capacity to cope #Lesbos
Responsibility for the refugee crisis must not be distributed according to geography and borders, it is too large to be borne by one country or one region only
The strategy will help increase traffic efficiency, productivity, reduce traffic congestions and pollution & save millions of driving hours
We must bring humanity and compassion back into the narrative because the refugee crisis is about people, not borders and barriers #Lesbos
We must think in a humane way when we face the refugee crisis, because this crisis is about the lives of real people, not the borders of Lesbos
We've also launched the Autonomous Transportation Challenge, the world's largest RFP to global R & D centers to apply this technology in Dubai
Dubai offer's a global unique model for the city of the future & turns itself to the world largest R & D lab for driverless transportation
The global community must find legal alternatives and pathways to safety, and work on long term sustainable solutions to this crisis #Lesbos
The international community must find solutions and legitimate alternatives to safe migration, and we must find sustainable solutions to the refugee crisis # Lesbos
Listening to the stories from refugees, it's difficult to decide which story is more harrowing than the other because each one is a tragedy
When you hear the stories of the suffering of refugees you can not tell which one is the hardest and most bitter - every story carries with it a real tragedy that can not be imagined.
The international community must support humanitarian agencies like the IRC and UNHCR for their tire work in helping refugees #Lesbos
The international community must support humanitarian organizations that assist refugees such as the International Rescue Committee and the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees (UNHCR)
